span.p: Transaction data kept\n3 years for support

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Financial records kept\n7 years for tax purposes

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Ledger data kept\n10 years for auditing

span.p:
Customer Info Database
- Names, Contact details
- Account IDs
[Retention: Active + 2 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Billing Database
- Transaction records
- Payment tokens
[Retention: 3 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Finance Data Lake
- Transaction records (with IDs)
- Usage data (pseudonymized)
[Retention: 7 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
General Ledger System
- Aggregated financial data
- Limited personal data
[Retention: 10 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Archived Records
- Legal compliance data
- Pseudonymized
[Retention: 7-10 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Anonymous Analytics
- Statistical usage data
- No personal identifiers
[Retention: Indefinite]
